channel.description: Recent content in Home-rsses on RedElastic

item.description:
RedElastic is proudly located in downtown Toronto, Canada.

Schedule a chat

RedElastic Inc.
901 King Street West, Suite 400
Toronto, Ontario, Canada
M5V 3H5

Goals of your Leadership

RedElastic is singularly focused on making the goals of your leadership a reality. We start every engagement with a number of sessions to fully map out the scope of your technical project along with long-term leadership goals. From these sessions can best advise on how to deliver solutions that fit your goals into the ever-evolving technical landscape.

Partnering with the best

Our extensive experience centers around partnerships, from vendors to other industry experts. Our engagements are focused on long-lasting relationships, which include helping your organization to form meaningful connections in the open source community.

item.title: We don't stop at technology. We empower trainers and advocates within your organization.
item.description:
Our goal at RedElastic is to empower people. A success story for you means that we provide the tools to unlock hidden talent within your organization; we measure our success by your success, not by billable hours.

Every RedElastic engagement is centered around training your trainers, to inspire the advocates and leaders already within your organization. Our mission is to equip and inspire the formation of learning cultures.
